title: Somebody Like You
lyrics:
(Somebody, body like, body like you
Somebody, body like, body like you)
Crystaline feelings when our souls align
Hope we never end
Storylines, twisting, turning through the night

Blowing in the wind



Been up for days

In your embrace

On a new high

We chase the moonlight

Up for days

In your embrace

If we say goodbye

I may never fly



Somebody, body like, body like you

Somebody, body like, body like you

Somebody, body like, body like you

Somebody, body like, body like you



Somebody, body like, body like you

I'll never find somebody like you

Body like, somebody, body like you

I'll never find somebody like you



Talk to me, senses taking over me

Basking in the beat

Purity, how you hold me underneath

Almost like a dream



Scenery change when you call my name

Down the fire escape

Misery fades when I find your face

[?] always



Somebody, body like, body like you

Somebody, body like, body like you

Somebody, body like, body like you

Somebody, body like, body like you



Somebody, body like, body like you

I'll never find somebody like you

Body like, somebody, body like you

I'll never find somebody like you



Been up for days

In your embrace

On a new high

We chase moonlight

Up for days

In your embrace

If we say goodbye

I may never fly



Body like, somebody, body like you

I'll never find somebody like you

Body like, somebody, body like you

I'll never find somebody like you
